Name: Core Passive: Power Charge
Additional Ability: Synced Acceleration
Descriptions: When Piper's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, up to a maximum of 20 stacks, lasting for 12s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. For every stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, Piper's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>2%</color>.

Cons.Name: Leisure Moment
Cons.Effect: When Piper's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy with a spinning slash, there is a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>. The maximum stack limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color> is increased to 30.

Cons.Name: Motivation
Cons.Effect: During <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, Piper's movement speed increases. When using <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: One Trillion Tons</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> to launch a downward smash that hits an enemy, the <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> dealt by the move is increased by 10%. For each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, this buff is further increased by 1%.

Cons.Name: Refined Techniques
Cons.Effect: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, Piper recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 30s.

Cons.Name: Mild Excitement
Cons.Effect: Increases the duration limit of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> by 2s and extends the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color> by 4s.
